msbt.message: Oh, uh, hey. Are you here for the Bug-Off?I'm Flick. I'm running the event because I'm afan of bugs. Some folks call me the Arthropod Artiste! I don't usually like big events, butfor the bugs I would climb any fountain, swim with any bee! Anyway, the Bug-Off starts at . Don't forget your net.
is a great month for bugs! Who knows which of the messengers may scuttle from the heavens? The Bug-Off will start at . My excitement transcends the mortal realm!
Are there any sweeter words in the Animalese language than "Bug-Off"?
The Bug-Off starts at .You have your net, right? You need a net to participate. Do you have a backup net?
Oh! I was hoping you would show up—you've still got points left over from the last Bug-Off. You've got points. Would you like to redeem points for a relic?
Redeem for a relic.
I'm good.
Oh! I was hoping you would show up—you've still got points left over from the last Bug-Off. You've got points. Would you like to redeem them for a relic?
Redeem for a relic.
I'm good.
Huh? What is it?
I wanna redeem points.
Never mind.
Wait. Your pockets are too full to carry one of these relics.Come back when you are spiritually and pocketually prepared.
Then it must be time to dig into the reliquary! So you're redeeming points for a bug relic
BEHOLD! !
I looked high and low for relics that would properly celebrate the antennaed majesty of bugs. Enjoy! The Bug-Off starts at . I hope you're planning to earn some more points!
The epic tale of my pilgrimage to obtain these relics should be written on a scroll or something! Enjoy. And the Bug-Off isn't over until ! Go earn some more points if you want.

I spent months chasing down different bug legends to find all these relics. Use that one well. Oh, and you've got enough points for another relic, but no space in your thorax—I mean, pockets! You might want to go deal with that and come talk to me again.
You still have a lot of points left over. You interested in some more redemption?
Redemption, please!
I'm good.
Oh, OK Well, you can redeem points whenever, so just come talk to me if you change your mind.
Oh, uh, OK Well, I'm here until . Just come talk to me if you want to redeem some points.
Hey, it's showtime for the Bug-Off! You excited? Of course you are! You feel it, right? That electricity? Today the wall is thinner between this world and the Infested Realms!

The rules for the Bug-Off are simple. Each round, you catch as many bugs as you can within minutes. I'll give you points depending on how many bugs you catch.Collect a lot of points and you can redeem them for sacred, bug-related relics I've been able to acquire. During the Bug-Off, bugs you catch are miraculously transubstantialized to the bug cage over by the tent. You can play a round anytime, as long as you've got a net. No pocket space required!

The rules for the Bug-Off are simple. Each round, you catch as many bugs as you can within minutes. I'll give you points depending on how many bugs you catch.You'll also earn bonus points based on the total points earned by any friends you've got playing with you! Collect a lot of points and you can redeem them for sacred, bug-related relics I've been able to acquire. During the Bug-Off, bugs you catch are miraculously transubstantialized to the bug cage over by the tent. You can play a round anytime, as long as you've got a net. No pocket space required!
So. Are you ready to join your fellow pilgrims in the Bug-Off? There's no entry fee for first-timers!
Play a round.
What're the rules?
Redeem points.
Not right now.
Oh. OK.Well, I'll be here until . You knowif you change your mind.
So far, your point total is . Good work!
Once you save up points, you can redeem them for bug-blessed relics I've obtained. Good luck!
Um, hi. Did you want to play a round of the Bug-Off? It's free for first-timers!
Play a round.
What're the rules?
Redeem points.
Not right now.

For the bugs, I shall explain as many Bug-Off rules as are needed, as many TIMES as are needed! Rule number one: catch as many bugs as you can within minutes!Rule number two: you'll earn points based on how many bugs you catch! Or just have a meaningful experience with. Rule number three: points can be redeemed for bug-related relics of uncalculized value!

All of the bugs you catch will be transubstantialized through the ether to the bug cage by the tent. That means all you need is a net— no pocket space required. The bugs welcome even the full-pocketed!
Did youwanna participate in the Bug-Off? It's to play a round.
Play a round.
Not right now.
So, do you want to join in the Bug-Off festivities? Your first round today is free, if that helps.
Play a round.
Not right now.
The Bug-Off is on right now until ! It's an unprecedented chance to commune with bug-kind!
Sounds exciting, right? You want to try playing a round?It's also totally free when there's a visitor from another island participating!
Play a round.
What're the rules?
Redeem points.
Not right now.
Are you ready to have a Bug-Off experience? You might even meet your soul-bug! Oh, and rounds are free when there's a visitor from another island participating!
Play a round.
Not right now.
Hey! You know that the Bug-Off is free right now because there are off-island visitors involved, right?
Play a round.
What're the rules?
Redeem points.
Not right now.
Um, hello there!

Oh, h-hi there! Are youhere for the Bug-Off? It's a celebration of bugs and all they do for us! I'm Flick, by the way—bug buff and insect enthusiast, sometimes called the Arthropod Artiste. I'm not usually one for big events, but I heard the buzz of the divine in this one! Anyway, you should play a round! The Bug-Off brings even us lowly mortals closer to the Heavenly Hive! You can play anytime before .

The Bug-Off is finally here! The time when the mosquito netting between the worlds is at its thinnest! And Flick, the shy Arthropod Artiste, is hosting! It's like my sweetest nightmare come to squirming life! Er, what I mean to say isI'm honored to be your hostbut crowds aren't really my thing. Um, have fun!

The rules, of course Fret not— I will explain them as many times as needed. The Bug-Off rules are fairly simple. Catch as many bugs as you can within minutes.You'll earn points based on how many bugs you catch in each round of your pilgrimage.You'll also get a team bonus based on the number of points your fellow pilgrims earn. Good luck.
Right, your total points so far Looks like !
Your points so far total .Oh! But you're just a mere mortal, set against the mighty powers of a bug, soyou knowno shame.
You can keep playing as many rounds as you want until . I hope you'll maintain your devotion!
Bug-Offs are over for , but just wait until next . I'm excited to see what you catch then!
There will be another Bug-Off in . I feel the bugs will bless you then. THIS IS MY PROPHECY.
Ah, looks like you already have points Do you want to redeem them for a blessed relic?
Redemption, please!
Later.
Oh! You already have points saved up!Do you want to redeem points for a bug-blessed relic to, umpass on to your children someday?
Redemption, please!
Later.
Got questions about bugs? I've spent my life seeking the answers!
Play a round.
What're the rules?
Something else.
Never mind.
Oh, OK. Um, I'm here until , even a bit after the event is over. Come talk to me about bugs anytime!
Oh, o-of course! Erm, how about I'll buy your bugs and I pay extra and I'll give them a good home I promise!
Can I sell you bugs?
Redeem points.
So about the Bug-Off...
Never mind.
Y-yeah, of course! Which of your bug patrons are you willing to part with?
What? A plurality of singularities? My insectile entreaties are answered, and the answer is "Bzzzzzz!" Is this it? Am I about to meet my chitinous patron?Ahem. Sorry. Will you accept for them?
Yes, please.
Never mind.
! I've never beheld its equal Not awake, anyway Would you sell me your exquisite for ?
Yes, please.
Never mind.
Always glad to buy bugs! Always.
Really?! Th-thank you!

R-really?! That's great! What have you got for me?!Wait—you don't have the energy, the aura, the <10_5 />MAJESTY of someone with bugs in their pockets! Sorry, but I can only buy bugs that, you know, exist. But, um, come back when you've caught some!
W-wait! You're not gonna sell?! ButI was gonna buyNo, it's fine. Today is the Bug-Off. I'll have plenty of chances to meet interesting bugs today.
O-oh! Youchanged your mind? OK. II understand.
It's fine. Look, it's fine. Today's the Bug-Off, and I'll be making all kinds of tiny, chitinous friends today.
Hmm. You don't appear to have a net. That's a problem.Mortals can only withstand bugs' radiant glory with a net to shield us. Without one you would surely perish!
Oh! Um, apologies, but you don't have enough Bells.Come back once you have . Sorry!
Nice! Each firefly brightens the sky that much more! Er, metaphorically. We don't just catch fireflies. Um, the entry fee after your first round is . Is that gonna be OK?
Sure thing!
Never mind.
Great I'll just collect those , then
OK I'm gonna start the timer for minutes. You're gonna catch bugs. Any kind—just catch a lot. Oh, and you'll get bonus points if you catch at least So, uh, good luck! Alright, get ready to transcend

OK I'm gonna start the timer for minutes. You're gonna catch bugs. Any kind—just catch a lot. Oh, and you'll get bonus points if you catch at least So, uh, good luck! Everybody starts the round at the same time, so get ready to transcend
W-wonderful! That's great! I think you'll find it illuminatinga-and fun!

Oh, hang on. I can still feel sacred emanationsum, emanating from 's bug cage! You can't start the next round until everyone's bug cages are empty. Sorry!Could you tell to take their bugs or sell them to me? I'll pay a good price!

Do you feel that? There are still insectile emanations lighting up the bug cage. We can't start the next round until everyone has emptied their cages. It is their will and I am but their vessel. Sorry for the trouble, but if you see any of the others, would you tell them to collect or sell me their bugs?
Oh, sorry! There's a round going on right now, so I can't start you off just yet. We'll get your spiritual experience going in just a few minutes!
You think you're catching them, but the bugs are teaching you to be as they are. It's a cooperative thing.
The Infested Realm exists outside our world, but can be seen in bugs. They are like windows to its bliss.
Don't ask me how to catch bugs. I am but a pilgrim on this road, just as you are. Good luck!

Greetings, my fellow Initiate of the Diaphanous Carapace!Oh! Erm, sorry—I mistook you for someone else. You're probably just here for the Bug-Off. You can feel it, no? The thrum in the air, as millions of tiny wings beat against the breeze?
Hey, d-did you like the Bug-Off? I worked really hard on it so I hope you had fun.
It was super fun!
It was life changing!
Eh, it was OK...
R-really? I meanthat's great! I'm not really a "festival" kind of guy, so I wasn't sure how it would go
WASN'T IT, THOUGH?! I'm so glad you thought so too! Thanks for being here with me!
O-oh. WellI'm, uh, sorry to hear that.Maybe you didn't meet the right bugs this time? You can try again next timeif you want.
Um, anyway, it looks like you've still got some pointsYou've got points available. Would you like to redeem them for a relic?
Redeem points.
I'm good.
Um, anyway, it looks like you've still got some pointsYou've got points available. Would you like to redeem of them for a relic?
Redeem points.
I'm good.
Um, just so you know, the next Bug-Off will be in . In case you want to participate again.
Um, just so you know, the next Bug-Off will be next . After the bugs wake up.
Oh. OK. That's cool.

Hey, did you enjoy our celebration of bugs in all their creeping, crawling resplendence? You're probably wondering how shy Flick, the Arthropod Artiste, wound up hosting a big, noisy event, huh? It's true that I was pretty nervous, but I HAD to host it. You know, for the enrichment of the bugs!
I'm here until . Let me know if I can help you with anything! Anything bug related!
Speaking of enrichment, you appear to have quite a wealth of Bug-Off points saved up. Are you ready to redeem them for the priceless bug-related relics I have gathered for the event?
Redeem points.
I'm good.
Hey, uh, can I help you?
Redeem points.
Never mind.
The next Bug-Off is in . I hope you find your way to the path of communal bug collection then.
Bug season goes on, until their light leaves our world again. There'll be another Bug-Off next month.
With 's bug festival over, it'll be time to de-people my life again for a while
There won't be another Bug-Off until next year. It'll happen in . I, um, hope you'll be there!
And so ends another bug season Don't forget—the next Bug-Off is next year. I hope I see you again!
Oh, you're from another island, aren't you? Are you visiting for the Bug-Off? We're in the middle of a round right now, but you can brandish the net for your faith in the next one!

I am a part of the swarm and the swarm is a part of me I am a part of the swarm and the swarm is a part of meOh—didn't see you there! Er, you can join in the Bug-Off once the current round is over. Give it a moment.
You'll be able to join in on the next round.Prepare your net by holding down  and moving. Prepare also your truest self. There is no truest-self button.
Waiting for the next round of the Bug-Off is a bit like being a wasp nest You feel full of fierce energy, ready to burst forth and angrily bless whoever shook your tree!
Oh, umhave you checked your bug cage lately?No reason, but if for some reason you don't want your bugs, I'm happy to libera—BUY them all from you.
Buy them all!
My bug cage?
I'll go check.
What—really?! You don't need them as spiritual guides? <10_5 />I mean— let me just add it up for you.Let's see, how many bugs? Given species and metaphysics How's ?
Sell! Sell!
Hold on.
Oh, uh, looks like your wallet is actually full. I'll just send this to your bank account
Th-thanks!
Oh! That filled up your wallet, so I'll just give you the rest in a bag, OK? Thanks!
I'll be sure to provide a good home for any bugs from your bug cage. I hope you'll play another round!
The next Bug-Off is all set for . I hope you'll join our crawling, flying, stinging brethren!
This is the last Bug-Off for this year, but the next one will be in . Prepare yourself.
Each bug you catch during a round is immediately transubstantialized to your bug cage. If you want to pick up your bugs, you can find your cage over by the tent. You'll be able to smell the majesty.
You can start your next round once your bug cage is empty. Careful you don't get radiance on your hands.
I'll be here until if you want to sell any bugs. After that, I go where the butterflies' wings flap me.

The bugs will not accept becagement forever. I expect the bug cage will be empty by tomorrow at . If there's a bug in there you want to keep, be sure to collect it by then. I advise doing it respectfully.

Oh, hello! You were participating in the Bug-Off, weren't you? Weird that we didn't run into each other! I'm Flick, your host. Also called the Segmented Sculptor. The Virtuoso of Vermin. The Arthropod Artiste! Was it fun? Did you meet the one bug in all the world that sees into your souland lays its eggs there?
Hey, how was it? Did you make progress on your personal journey toward True Infestation?
Ah, I see. It was a net loss, then, spiritually speaking. I mourn for you.

By the way, when folks from other islands participate, you get extra points based on total bugs caught. I'm not saying this is the secret to scoring a bunch of extra points, but I'm not NOT saying that.
Oh, hey! Glad you could join in today's festival of buggy delights!Did you have fun? Did you ascend to a higher plane of awareness and light? Did you catch any bugs?

Oh, uhlooks like you weren't especially blessed by the Joint-Legged Ones. Sorry But the total from all the folks participating is So you get a team bonus since it's over . That means you get points for this round!

If you're looking for any new friends you caught during the round, they're in the bug cage by the tent. As always, I'm happy to buy any bugs with whom you don't plan to form a lasting relationship. But before we talk about any buying or selling, let's tally up your round results!
Let's see, the total number of bugs you put in your cage was <10_4 /> Nice. That brings your points to .
The total number of bugs in the bug cage is Oh, that's at least , so you get a bonus!Well done. You earned points!
Hmm Let's see The total caught between all members of the pilgrimage is . All pilgrims get a team bonus since it's at least Next, you caught bugs, so if we add those together, you earned points!

Hmm Let's see The total caught between all members of the pilgrimage is . All pilgrims get a team bonus since it's at least AND you caught bugs, which is also at least , so you get a challenge bonus too!And since you caught bugs, add all the bonuses together, and<10_4 /> Whoa! That's points!

Already you have encircled some bugs in your +5 Net of Begirding. You are exquisitely fast at this! It's not safe to confine more than 20 bugs in a small space, lest their combined might rend reality itself! I therefore took the liberty of removing some extras from the bug cage. This is all for the bugs, and therefore for the world, so I hope you will consider these bugs a donation. Fret not, you will still score points! The standard points, plus a bonus for catching or more That's points total!

Already you have encircled some bugs in your +5 Net of Begirding. You are exquisitely fast at this! It's not safe to confine more than 20 bugs in a small space, lest their combined might rend reality itself! I therefore took the liberty of removing some extras from the bug cage. This is all for the bugs, and therefore for the world, so I hope you will consider these bugs a donation. Fret not, you will still score points! Let's see, the participants this time have caught bugs totalThat's or more, so you get a team bonus. Bringing you to points total!

The bug cage with all the bugs you caught is by the tent—just follow the scent of nectar and ambrosia. All the bugs caught by your fellow pilgrims are also in there, so you can check on their behalf as well. You can also sell any unwanted bugs in the cage to me—just talk to me after this. But first, let me announce your round results!

The Bug-Off rules are quite simple. Catch as many bugs as you can within minutes! You'll earn points based on how many bugs bless your net.Collect a lot of points and you'll be able to redeem them for bug-related relics I'veacquired. You may also lead a pilgrimage of multiple bug catchers who can help you earn points. But I can only award points to the leader of such a pilgrimage, so decide among yourselves who leads.

Any and all bugs you catch will be miraculously transubstantialized into the bug cage by the tent. This means anyone with a net can participate, even if their pockets are full to bursting with wasp nests!

OK, I'm gonna start the timer for minutes as soon as we're done talking. Catch any and all bugs! Your fellow pilgrims' catches will also count toward your total and be transubstantialized to the bug cage. Catch over and you'll earn bonus points. So, uh, good luck!<10_4 /> Readygo!

By the way, I can only give points to one member of a group pilgrimage, so be sure you know who's leading. You will find the bugs you catch during the round in the bug cage by the tent over there. The bugs your fellow pilgrims catch will also be transubstantialized to your bug cage.
Wanna play a round of the Bug-Off?<10_4 /> You've led a pilgrimage before, so there's an entry fee of .
Play a round.
Not right now.
Wanna play a round of the Bug-Off?<10_4 /> It's free to join if it's your first time leading the pilgrimage.
Play a round.
Not right now.
Wanna play a round of the Bug-Off?<10_4 /> It's free to join if it's your first time leading the pilgrimage.
Play a round.
What're the rules?
Redeem points.
Not right now.
Do you feel the Bug-Off energy buzzing in your teeth? Play a round! Bring a friend if you like!
Hey, getting excited? Today's the big day when we separate the pupae from the larvae. The Bug-Off! We'll get started at . Until then, just enjoy the anticipation crawling all over your body!
How did you enjoy this Bug-Off, our regular celebration of bugs? Were you spiritually enriched?
Hey there! Do you wanna play a round of the Bug-Off? It's free if it's your first time leading a pilgrimage! It's also free for any of your fellow pilgrims, so gather them up and join in!
Play a round.
What're the rules?
Redeem points.
Not right now.
That means Oh! Your total points from all the Bug-Offs now adds up to at least ! If I may dare to speak for the bugs, thanks for your devotion to them! I'll send you a prize in the mail.
That means Oh! Your total points from all the Bug-Offs now adds up to at least ! If I may dare to speak for the bugs, thanks for your devotion to them! I'll send you a prize in the mail.
That means Oh! Your total points from all the Bug-Offs now adds up to at least ! If I may dare to speak for the bugs, thanks for your devotion to them! I'll send you a prize in the mail.
Good work, and don't worry
And any more points you earn will be automatically added to your total.
Save up enough points, and you can redeem them for mighty bug-related relics! Ask me about it later.
Points can be redeemed at any Bug-Off. May the fireflies light your way.
Redeem for a relic.
I'm good.
I wanna redeem points.
Never mind.
Receive relic.
Never mind.
Play a round.
What're the rules?
Redeem points.
Not right now.
Redemption, please!
Later.
Something else.
Can I sell you bugs?
Yes, please.
Never mind.
